name: Calamixty
description:
YOU'VE BEEN CURSED!

Find the right potion to remove it! But be careful: If you don't use the right ingredients, in the right order, you're slapped with another curse! And the curses stack!

Find the right ingredients, in the right order, to remove all the curses!

Controls:

  • Left mouse button: Pickup and drop
  • Right mouse button: Check potion mix history

Special thanks: Teresia Lashley & Richard Mondoux
